Posts.Content: My husband has breast cancer. I would like some men talk about their bout with breast cancer. If their is a man out there who would share their, I would be ever so greatful. He has finnally settled down and accepting it . I am sure whsn he reads this he will be too happy to share his experiences. Looking to hear from someone soon.
Posts.Title: Healing Breast Cancet in Men
